Title: Dewprism Tactics
BriefDescription: A fan-made Tabletop Roleplaying Game styled in the fun and fantasy of early JRPG's such as Final Fantasy Tactics (SquareEnix) and Threads of Fate (SquareSoft).
FullDescription:
Hosted for free on GitHub pages, this website behaves as a core rulebook while also utilizing JavaScript to make navigation easier. Currently,
        the game boasts over 30 completed classes to mix-and-match from, along with a host of monsters to fight, and rules for everything from character creation to adventuring.

Title: Miracle
BriefDescription: A world of magic and discovery in the midst of a secret war between good and evil for the fate of the planet.
FullDescription: Originally written in 2018 and completed in 2020, Miracle marks Caleb's first big step into the world of TTRPG's. The 440pg corebook teaches players about the world of Volmirus, how to make characters, go on adventures, and provides players with everything they need to go on fantastic adventures.
